title: Average ticket price Boston Celtics ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13, and lastly roughly constant from 2012/13 to 2013/14.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 72.96 was reported at Year 2012/13
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 68.55 was reached at Year 2011/12
